attributes.action: David Cameron to step down as prime-minister
attributes.background: With everything that's going on in the world with terrorism why are we accepting refugees from Syria even though Islamic state have said this is how they aim to get there "soldiers" into Europe.

rejection.details:
The resignation of an individual Minister is not a matter for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You may wish to sign a petition calling on the Government to change its immigration policy.
